## Matrix.Invert() method

Creates a new matrix as the invert of a given matrix

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Invert(source: Matrix): Matrix;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  source | <code>Matrix</code> | defines the source matrix |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix`

the new matrix
